page.title: 06MEDIA - LOCAL NEWSPAPERS
page.content: There are two local{Tiverton newspapers, the{Tiverton Gazette}and the{Mid Devon Star.}The Star is free but you have to pay for the Gazette. As well as reading the papers for {local news,}people are interested in the columns on{births, coming of age, {congratulations, marriages and deaths so that they can keep up to date with what has happened to people they know.The local newspapers are very important for{advertising}and many firms advertise their goods and services. Ordinary people can advertise in the{under Â£25}bargain section without paying any fee. This column is very popular. The papers also tell us what is on at the{local {cinema}and they give all the local {sporting news and results.}Local people like to write letters about things which concern the community.
